definition: Dongjiang River
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
surname Dong

sentences.english: The quality of the Dongjiang water has long been critised.
sentences.chinese: 東江水水質一直備受批評。

sentences.english: In a word. East River Region was the economic barycenter of Lingnan in Eastern Zhou Period.
sentences.chinese: 歸納之，東周時期東江流域是嶺南的經濟重心。

sentences.english: The water is of second-class quality， according to mainland standards.
sentences.chinese: 東江水水質屬國家二級水源標準。

sentences.english: Fish is imported from Dongjiang Reservoir in Chenzhou.
sentences.chinese: 魚類就是從郴州的東江水庫進口。

sentences.english: The reporter then went to the Dongjiang River is still the product houses.
sentences.chinese: 記者隨後來到了東江尚品售房部。

sentences.english: TK Group is a Hong Kong invested corporation, located in Baoan District of Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 東江集團是一家港資企業，位於深圳市寶安區。

sentences.english: The wetland in Dongjiang lake is the largest artificial one in Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 東江湖溼地是湖南省面積最大的人工溼地。

sentences.english: The Dongjiang Lake Canyon is located Zixing City, south Hunan Province, China.
sentences.chinese: 東江湖峽谷位於湘南資興市，峽谷裏有一條河流。

sentences.english: The Dongjiang Shangpin real estate, Real Estate Development Co. , Ltd. Chi Shang development.
sentences.chinese: 東江尚品樓盤，爲志尚房地產開發有限公司開發。

sentences.english: An investigation was conducted in Dongjiang tree park of Huizhou.
sentences.chinese: 文章對惠州市東江樹木園觀賞植物資源進行調查。
